_sText:
zm\_ATIX_helicopter IN ACTION QUICK MOVIE: ^ VIDEO BY Zargotelc from zombiemurder.com After beta testing this map I finally decide to release it, going gold! *As survivors you must work together to hold off the zombies from extraction point, the helicopter will take you to the nearest cover which should be above a bridge, their you must run for cover into the subway before air strike arrives!** Thanks to everyone that hosted tested my map specially to =(UV)= UndeadVengeance.com community for hosting my betas and feedback, also a big thanks to cam over at PlagueFest.com and to everyone else that played it. Additional Info:
*69 Spawn Points
*Take a step down to open roof doors
*Recommended round time 5 minutes
*Lots of secrets and (riddle)
*Spread out inside heli & do not duck so you don't get stuck
*Finally Get off the heli and run into the subway for cover! A List of Servers Currently Playing My Map: http://www.game-monitor.com/MapSearch/all/zm_atix_helicopter/
